workflow.name: Automated workflow backup system with Google Drive, GitHub & messaging alerts
workflow.description:
## Why You Need This Right Now üí°

**Stop the panic attacks.** We've all been there - accidentally deleted a workflow that took hours to build, or worse, corrupted your entire automation setup. This workflow is your safety net.

**Save your weekends.** Instead of spending hours recreating lost work, get back to what matters. One setup protects everything, automatically.

**Sleep better at night.** Your workflows are safely stored in two places with full version history. If something breaks, you're back online in minutes, not days.

## Perfect For These Situations ‚ö°

‚úÖ **Business owners** running critical automations  
‚úÖ **Agencies** managing client workflows  
‚úÖ **Teams** who need audit trails  
‚úÖ **Anyone** who values their time and sanity  

## How It Actually Works üîß

Think of it like having a personal assistant who:

1. **Checks your workflows** twice daily (you can change this)
2. **Creates organized backups** with timestamps 
3. **Stores them safely** in Google Drive AND GitHub
4. **Tells you it's done** via Telegram or Discord
5. **Keeps everything tidy** with smart folder organization

**The result?** A timestamped folder in your Google Drive and organized files in your GitHub repo. Everything is searchable, restorable, and audit-ready.

## Quick 5-Minute Setup üöÄ

1. **Import** this workflow to your n8n
2. **Connect your accounts** (Google Drive, GitHub, optional notifications)
3. **Set your preferences** (which folder, which repo, how often)
4. **Test it once** to make sure everything works
5. **Relax** knowing your workflows are protected

## What You'll Need üìã

- Your n8n instance (obviously!)
- Google Drive account (free works fine)
- GitHub account (free works too)
- 5 minutes of setup time
- Optional: Telegram or Discord for notifications

## Pro Tips for Power Users üß†

Want to level up? Here are some ideas:

- **Add encryption** for sensitive workflows
- **Create restore workflows** for one-click recovery
- **Set up pull requests** for team review of changes
- **Customize schedules** based on your workflow update frequency

**Created by:** [khaisa Studio](https://khaisa.studio) - Automation experts who actually use this stuff daily

**Tags:** backup, automation, n8n, google-drive, github, workflow-protection, business-continuity

**Questions?** [Get in touch](https://khaisa.studio/contact) - I'm always happy to help fellow automation enthusiasts!

---

*Remember: The best backup is the one you set up before you need it. Your future self will thank you!*

parameters.text:
=‚úÖ Backup Status: {{ $json.status }}
Total Workflows: {{ $json.total_workflows }}
Timestamp: {{ $json.backup_timestamp }}
Drive Folder: {{ $json.gdrive_folder }}
Repo Name: {{ $('Config').item.json.repo_name }}

Your n8n backup has been completed successfully!

parameters.content:
## üöÄ n8n Workflow Backup System

### üìã Requirements
- **n8n API Credentials** - For fetching workflows
- **Google Drive OAuth2** - For cloud backup storage  
- **GitHub OAuth2** - For version control backup
- **Telegram Bot API** (Optional) - For notifications
- **Discord Bot API** (Optional) - For notifications

### üîó Resource URLs
- **n8n API**: [docs.n8n.io/api](https://docs.n8n.io/api/)
- **Google Drive API**: [console.cloud.google.com](https://console.cloud.google.com/)
- **GitHub OAuth**: [github.com/settings/developers](https://github.com/settings/developers)
- **Telegram Bot**: [@BotFather](https://t.me/botfather)
- **Discord Bot**: [discord.com/developers](https://discord.com/developers/applications)

### ‚ú® Features
- Dual backup (Google Drive + GitHub)
- Version control with Git history
- Sanitized filenames (removes special characters)
- Error handling with fallback
- Optional notifications on completion
- Runs automatically twice daily

## ‚öôÔ∏è Configuration
Edit the **Config** node with your settings:
- `repo_owner` - Your GitHub username
- `repo_name` - Repository name for backups
- `repo_path` - Folder path in repo (e.g., "n8n-backup/")
- `gdrive_folder_id` - Google Drive parent folder ID
- `telegram_chat_id` - Your Telegram chat ID (optional)

### üìä Workflow Process

1. **Trigger** ‚Üí Manual or scheduled every 12 hours
2. **Setup** ‚Üí Creates timestamped backup folder in Google Drive
3. **Fetch** ‚Üí Gets all workflows from n8n instance
4. **Loop Process** ‚Üí For each workflow:
   - Converts to formatted JSON file
   - Uploads to Google Drive folder
   - Checks if file exists on GitHub
   - Creates new or updates existing GitHub file
5. **Complete** ‚Üí Sends summary notifications to Telegram & Discord

### üìÅ Backup Structure
- **Google Drive**: `/wfBackup - YYYY-MM-DD_HH-mm-ss/workflow_name.json`
- **GitHub**: `/n8n-backup/YYYY/MM/workflow_name.json`

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
